Text: This anime is so kawaiee. Thanks a lot, i truly love your work.

Still watching, so far excellent. Noticed a small issue with subs during the first episode, but has not reoccurred. So much better than hulu xD
Thanks again

I know chances are slim that you will even see this, but could you please put them into something other than .mkv? I'm having a hard time converting episodes 14-25 out of that format. I tried converting them into .avi/.mpg/.flv, all of them only converted a minute and a half in. I don't know if there's an issue with the episodes themselves or what.
If you need to convert them i recommend downloading freestudio, its what i use and it works very well
